formattedNumbers.throttle.description: The delay in milliseconds before updating decorations. Set to 0 for immediate updates.

formattedNumbers.style.description: The style of the thousand separator.
enumDescriptions: A subtle separator below the line, keeping line width intact.
A standard grey comma, this will make line wider.

formattedNumbers.minLength.description: The minimum length of a number to be formatted. Recommended is 5, i.e. starting with 10,000, this will keep 4-digit years without separator.

formattedNumbers.maxLength.description: The maximum length of a number to be formatted.
